dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1975
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Recalls her own prison experiences while visiting Alderson Federal Prison in West Virginia. Mentions books on prison life. Also visits friends and family living nearby in the hills.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 565 1975-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
